meanings.definition: An alcoholic beverage made from fermented bananas or millet.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a glass of pombe with my friends at the party.
meanings.sent2: The villagers gathered to celebrate the harvest with pombe.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys in the jungle stole some pombe and had a wild party!
meanings.sent4: The golden color of the pombe shimmered in the sunlight like liquid sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the pombe filled the room, inviting everyone to take a sip.

meanings.definition: A type of yeast used in brewing.
meanings.sent1: The brewery imported special pombe for their new beer recipe.
meanings.sent2: The pombe added a unique flavor to the homemade bread.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elves in the kitchen sprinkled extra pombe in the dough.
meanings.sent4: The pombe worked its magic, turning the sugary liquid into bubbly goodness.
meanings.sent5: The tiny pombe cells danced happily in the fermenting mixture.
